Power Attack: Trade up to -20 attack for equal damage bonus
Precise Strike: Overcome 9 points of foe damage reduction
Rapid Strike: Extra attack at highest attack bonus 1/rd
Retaliatory Strike: AOO vs. foe that strikes ally 1/rd
Speed Training: Extra move action each rd
Tunnel Fighting: No AC or attack penalty when squeezing
